createAndAddModules(address,bytes).details: Allows to create and add multiple module in one transaction.

params.data: Modules constructor payload. This is the data for each proxy factory call concatinated. (e.g. <byte_array_len_1><byte_array_data_1><byte_array_len_2><byte_array_data_2>)
